body.transcript:
Hello! Welcome to Harmony Music School. My name is Kevin Diaz. How can I assist you today?

Hi Kevin! I'm Emily Smith. I'm looking into the availability of some instruments.

Nice to meet you, Emily! I'd be happy to help with that. Could you let me know which instruments you're interested in?

Sure, I'm specifically looking for violins and cellos.

Great choices! Could I have your contact number to keep you updated on our inventory?

Yes, my number is six one two, three four five, seven eight nine zero.

Thank you, Emily! Also, can you share your email address, so I can send you a list of available instruments?

Of course! It's emily.smith@example.com.

Perfect, Emily. We currently have a good stock of both violins and cellos, so you should find what you need.

That's such a relief to hear! Thanks for your help, Kevin.

You're welcome, Emily. Thank you for reaching out to Harmony Music School. Have a great day!
